topic.title: By Heresies Distressed
topic.body: Does anyone have a copy of, or know where to find the audiobook version of David Weber's By Heresies Distressed? I haven't been able to find any torrents with seeders.

1_15bmjskEVBxbkEpvt5EfKxFer7oA1vPLsM.body: Several of the country subdomains on here <http://www.freenom.com/en/index.html?lang=en> are free for a year's registration or so. My home server uses a ".cf" (for central african republic) domain.

1_1ANDGgXSZdcEr4XVJsSG1g7TQK8A4ZChA3.body: For the first part, could you create a third key and distribute it to ivanq and ivanq2, and just use that key as the admin key for the site?

2_18J68BvY3WjhBWy5P9GTYeiMMFXeh2vgAo.body: It's kind of pointless, but I'm trying to learn Esperanto.

1_1Ey4hYTcoTAGEbZM7UuMTNr24SH4LySwrP.body: Really, really hard. Copper lines are expensive, and at least in the US plenty of states have laws against the creation of municipal internet service.

Mesh networks are supposed to work well for city-wide networks. I live in a rural area, there's no feasible way to mesh with neighbors. Even with a city-wide mesh network I would need lines between my 7,000 person city and the next.

3_14ciQjA3TAFm1Sju8F3wDXRKgYvqoJ5w3B.body: Watching old stuff ( Serial Experiments Lain, Baccano! ) and "Ajin: demi-human"

1_12AMmCZUvspr4iu2oAtW187n1pAbujkRhW.body: PHP has to be processed by the PHP module in a server. In Zeronet, the website is local. There isn't any server to process the PHP.

2_15f49K29bmmEMu3FNtR3cbT3Wb28Hrsf9D.body: Screw it, I may as well learn Chinese.

3_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu.body: I'm sorry, I tried to visit that but I got a 403. Using Firefox.

9_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof.body: On a slightly unrelated note, the Duolingo Esperanto track is pretty good.

1_1KkYwbYeCF7s17AmUF9Tc7ckzCgt3UoaaC.body: Thanks a lot. I don't yet have a login for that site, but I'll give it a try.
Thank you very  much, all. I had never heard of BTDB and I've favorited it now. Audible's DRM and price make it difficult for me to use, but I hope to have money again one day.

1517855479_12ti3FAcNA64pgZaH59YNWBMdvEku.body: If you're here because you're bored with clearnet, you will probably be bored with zeronet also. The internet is a tool and a resource, but you get out what you put in.
